Items.Item: Join BakaXL Official Forum to Report Issues

Add A New Minecraft Core Or Package
Some Options Locked，Minecraft Version too low.
Some Options Locked，They are controlled by the Package Publisher.
Some Options Locked，They are controlled by the Package Server.
This core uses the Json not standard Minecraft core file.
This core uses the Json damage，BakaXL cannot read.
This core uses the identification file by other launcher，cannot read.
The Jar file required by the core does not exist.
The Minecraft core required by the core does not exist.
This core need to restore，Go To "Restore > Reset This Core".
BakaXL Can try fix this core，Go To "Restore > Auto Fix".
This core does not support installing Mods.
This core has never been played，sad :(
This Core or Package Have a Mods API.

This Core or Package Not Install Mods API. If your want use Mods，Should Install Forge、Farbic Or Other API.
If You Think That's A Problem by BakaXL ，Please Contact Us
This Core Installed Minecraft Forge. Version：{0}
This Core Installed Fabric Loader/API. Version：{0}
Drag the Mod in Here For Quick Installation.
BakaXL Will Scannig This Core Mods Folder, Any Supported Mods Will Show In There.
BakaXL Cannot found any Mods in this Core
If Minecraft cannot running, Reset Core maybe Fix it. BakaXL Will delete Libraries and Core Json, and try download this version by BakaPlaza.
Delete this Core by Minecraft Folder

BakaXL will delete this Minecraft core，this core's Mods/Maps/Screenshot/...will be delete.
This operation is irreversible. Please operate with caution.
Clean rubbish file in this core
We will delete logs and useless files；Usually, delete them to your game not have effect.
This core is too lazy to have a description.
BakaXL Task List >> No Task or Notice
Click on The Tiles Below to Explore More BakaXL Features
The new version of BakaXL is now released, the update was required to perform before you can continue. It won't take too long. Internet connection was required during the update.
It might take a little while
We need some information before you can start.
Click and Hold Here/or Press Space to Begin
You Can Change Setting Any Time in 'Settings - Accessibility'
Home Page Hide Start Menu and Tiles
Home Page Always Show Start Menu and Tiles
Use Some Theme and Feature，BakaXL Will Play Music or Sound Effects
BakaXL Will Basis Theme or Feature Play Music or Sound Effects
You can always change these in 'Settings'
BakaXL are no Longer Support Java 6
Looks like that we did not found any JVM on this PC
You must install JVM in order to run Minecraft
It is recommended to use at least 1024 MB of RAM
User Profile will store your Minecraft username. After login to BakaXL Account, your friends was able to see your profile in their Launcher
You can manage all the profile in the 'Settings'
Use your current profile to continue
The maxium number of profile was reached
BakaXL use the industry standard data encryption
You can always modify your profile in 'Settings'
Press the HOME button on the top left corner, or the HOME key on the keyboard to continue.
Get your Network ID after Login
Go to "Settings - Profiles" Login Your BakaXL Account
Your friends can search for your account by using BakaXL Network ID. Please tell the tag which following the username together when you are telling your friends your BakaXL Network ID.
If you join a BakaXL plan or BakaXL verification, them will show in there.
This friend is online now. If it is running Minecraft or using some BakaXL features, it will show here.
Time became friends：{0}。 You became friends by switching BakaXL Network ID.
Here will show you the Minecraft integration package your friend played recent time.
The grass is empty. It seems that there is nothing. If you send a friend request to others, then we will build a milestone here.
There is the footprint on the grass. Who will it be? We will build a milestone here after you accept a friend request.
The milestone was removed. There are only wreckages of the milestone on the grass. If you want to clean the wreckages up, you need to remove the other side from you blacklist.
You walked to this place, but there are all milestones around. You looked around and didn't see your own milestone, this makes you be full of termination.
When you removed the friend, you will also removed from the other side's friends list. If you want to add this friend again, you will need to resend the request.
You will become strangers when you remove others from your blacklist. If you want to add this friend again, you will need to resend the request.

This interace sticks your own information. You stand here, but don't know what to do.
You looked behind to BakaXL, but we don't know what to do either.
Oh, by the way: In the new version of BakaXL, we have changed the behavior that BakaXL performs a friend search, so keeping searching about yourself will have no impact on the server performance.
Your friends see your online status and the integration package name you playing. You can go to the Privacy Settings to modify the options related, or change your online status into "Stealth"。
If you are the lobby's creater, then you can invite your friend to your lobby here.
The others will show in your friends list after you accept the request. It won't receive the notification after you ignore the request.
Your friend will receive your request once you send it. All the requests send by your friends will be shown here.
Oops, it seems that there is no requests now. When you received the requests, they will show here.
Check all the requests you received and pending.
Enter the friend's BakaXL Network ID (Example: Username#1234)
Search friends by BakaXL Network ID
Find your friends by using BakaXL online services.
Add friends by using BakaXL Interlaced Communication
Join friends' local network games, or share your clients. Please let all your friends who will take part in be here.

Thanks for your support to BakaXL! As the member of the Insider Program, You can custom BakaXL Lobby ID when create! Please don't violate BakaXL ToS when using this feature. Using this feature in a wrong way will make your Insider status cancelled.
Start Minecraft and choose "Open to LAN" in a single game, then you can create a lobby. If detecting fails for a long time, try to start Minecraft after running BakaXL as administrator.
Join a friend or public lobby
输入要加入的大厅编号 (例如: 01509230)
输入好友或他人告知您的大厅编号，即可加入该大厅。 若大厅设置为仅对好友开放，则您必须为创建者的好友才可加入。
若您的好友邀请您加入其所在的大厅，他们将会显示在这里。
Join a third-party launcher's connect platform

若要加入由第三方启动器 (PCL2、HMCL) 创建的联机服务房间， 则您需要先在 BakaXL 笨蛋广场 安装跨启动器联机插件。
该项服务尚未开放，敬请期待。
自动同意加入大厅请求
介绍自动同意来自其他大厅加入者的加入请求。 这在您打算懒得手动处理互联网朋友的请求时大概很有用吧。 请注意。这将会允许所有知道大厅编号的用户随意加入该大厅。
在无法建立直接连接时使用中继连接
当 BakaXL 无法与对方建立直接连接时， 通过 BakaXL Network Relay 中继服务进行连接。 您的网络数据流量将通过受信任的BakaXL服务器进行安全中转。
若您当前正在参与 Minecraft 本地局域网联机， 离开该大厅将导致与创建者主机的连接被断开。
若有用户申请加入当前大厅，他们将会显示在这里。
选择一个用户，可进一步查看其账户信息，或添加对方为好友。
您是大厅创建者，可以通过长按对应用户将其移出此大厅。
大厅中 / 正在建立连接
大厅中 / 等待中继服务器响应
大厅中 / 游戏已断开
大厅中 / 连接已建立
大厅中 / 已通过中继建立连接
连接失败 / 未知错误
我正在 BakaXL 的线上游戏大厅！快在 BakaXL 领域 里输入大厅编号: <{0}> 来加入吧！
They a waiting the traffic light.
Download from BakaPlaza - Minecraft {1} with Forge {0}
Download from BakaPlaza - Minecraft {1} with Fabric {0}
Follow your favourite channels and learn about the news about them.
Maybe Your Internet Connect Have Some Problem or Tips Server Offline.
We May Not Advance Anyone us Server Maintenance Plan.
Third Party BakaXL Tips Channel Will Not Shot in There
Please Check Your Internet Connect. Maybe Tips Server is Offine.
If You Want Show Some Channel Tips, You Need Subscribe This Channel.
Please Check Your Internet Connect. Maybe This Channel Not Have Any Tips
BakaXL Cannot Load This Tips, Please Retry

Welcome to BakaXL Settings! We are working to add more wonderful features for BakaXL! Some options not available are the features BakaXL 3.0 not develop completed. Now, we're adjusting features in the interface according to your needs. Hope you can like it!
If you want to know how to use BakaXL and its features better, or get help, you can visit BakaXL Help and Support Website with your computer or smart devices.
BakaXL will record the errors in running automatically. You can click on a error to view all the information recorded.
These information only stores on localhost, and will not upload or save to any BakaXL server.
Learn about the information BakaXL collected?
There is no BakaCans here now.
I'm sure that there will be a lot of cans here soon.
Lost Focus Music Lost Focus Behavior
在资源管理器中显示此文件
Please contact BakaXL Developerment Team to get the solution of the problem.
Import user profile from other launcher
Export BakaXL user profile to other launcher

After importing other launcher's settings, limited by it's security restrictions, if you have a genuine Minecraft account, you have to enter the login password again. If you export the user profile from BakaXL, the profile will delete from BakaXL. You may still need to set some contents after importing.
Sign in to a BakaXL Account

Sign up a BakaXL Account and get a BakaXL Network ID, then you can enjoy the wonderful BakaXL online features.
After adding this game ID to your BakaXL account, you can add friends, check online status between each other, share game clients or join in each other's current games quickly.

All BakaXL instances in the computer will log in this account. Some BakaXL online service's features are not available in all countries or regions.
If you violate the BakaXL account rules, your account will be restricted.
Enter the email address you used for your BakaXL Account.
Enter this BakaXL Account's password. BakaXL will store these information encrypted.
Let BakaXL sign in for me automatically

Choose the verify mode when starting Minecraft. Online Mode: Sign in with your Mojang account. Offline Mode: Only confirm with a game ID.
According to related laws and rules, offline mode is not available in some countries or regions. The support for the third party verify services(based on authlib-injector) is coming soon.
Choose the verify mode when starting Minecraft. Use your Mojang account to sign in and start the game.
Choose the verify mode when starting Minecraft. User your Microsoft Account to sign in and start the game.。

Choose the Verify mode when starting Minecraft. Only use custom game ID to verify offline and start the game.
According to related laws and rules, offline mode is not available in some countries or regions.

Choose the verify mode when starting Minecraft. Use the information of the third party verify service to verify.
For your account safety, we do not recommend you to use the same password with your Mojang account in third party services.
Set your player name. Only English/Number/Underline, We do not recommend the use of Chinese and special symbols.
Enter your Mojang account login password. BakaXL will encrypted storage this infomation.
Please in new tab login your Microsoft Account BakaXL will not record your Account or Password BakaXL Connect to Microsoft Server will use Secure Sockets Layer.
This user profile will used Microsoft Account authorization

Verification Server（Yggdrasil Server）is this verification system core. when your completed this page we will send your user profile to verification server. if verification creater give you config,you can drag to BakaXL to import.
Warning:if you use http url,BakaXL will use plaintext transmission your infomation.
If sever return we can parse metadata,we will show in there Implementation version not Minecraft Version. Please use this infomation ensure is your want connect server.
When you in public computer we suggest enable this features. BakaXL will only save you account ID
BakaXL will use industrial-strength encryption method save your data. Please don't tell anyone your Account Password.
BakaXL will permanently delete this user profile and data. This operation irreversible.
We can't get Game ID,please retry.
Before return we must authentication account effectiveness
You must set a Game ID
You changed Game ID,something need reload.
For the best game experience,please choose Java version best fit for game.
Usually BakaXL auto select Java version best fit for game. If you don't what are you doing,please don't touch anything.
Play 1.16&lower version Minecraft we suggest use Java8. BakaXL will open trusted download site on your browse.

Play 1.17&higher version Minecraft must use Java 16. BakaXL will connect to Internet for download Java16 and auto Install This process takes several minutes. When you use toll network maybe need pay network costs.
BakaXL auto installing Java 16... Here show install status.
BakaXL successful install Java 16. Choose "Java Advance Setting - Auto search Java path" Refresh Java list.
BakaXL failed install Java 16. Maybe Download source network error or Internet disconnected.
BakaXL usually according to computer status set game memory. If you don't what are you doing,please don't touch anything.
Deprecated,BakaXL will try release idle memory.
If you want use "Manual set memory",you must shutdown Auto set memory features.
BakaXL 异域计划 / BakaXL Localization Project
本地化实用工具 / Localization Utilities
BakaXL support many country/area user language. Thanks to BakaXL users from all over the world The translator language must tested can use.
View BakaXL Localization Project homepage,get latest entry,become translator.

Temporarily use external files to change languages. This features is help translator debug XML
If you don't what are you doing,please don't touch anything.
BakaXL will show the result later...
The network environment won't affect the connect experience. This environment is fit for being the lobby creater.
This may affect your connect experience.
Some router or firewall settings may affect your connect experience.
Some router or firewall settings may affect your connect experience. If the lobby creater or your network devices support UPnP, then may alleviate.
This will affect your connect experience.
This will affect your connect experience. If the lobby creater or your network devices support UPnP, then may alleviate.
Your network devices or systems don't support UPnP now. If you enable it, then BakaXL will try to improve your connect experience by this protocol.

Your network devices or systems' support to UPnP isn't normal now. This may cause BakaXL can't improve your connect experience. If you think your network devices or systems don't have the problem, please connect BakaXL Development Team.
BakaXL sends a request to your network devices to improve your connect experience.
BakaXL doesn't begin to test network devices' UPnP support. When you begin to create P2P connections, BakaXL will begin to test and show the result.

If you can't connect to Mojang Authenticate Server, Usually try change to a clear DNS can solve it.
If this question always appear please contact your ISP. Make sure your Internet is not hijacked.
If you don't what are you doing,please don't touch anything.
Some settings move to advance core setting,click here enter core setting.
Set Minecraft Title started by BakaXL. The title allow some parameter to show dynamic content {time}: Show system time
Set Java Launch Parameter For special use only. If you don't what are you doing,please don't touch anything.
Auto join server after Minecraft loading successfully.

Check .minecraft/version/<Game Core> folder in before start,and cancel start when folder non-existent.
If wrong judgment folder non-existent please disable this features. After disabling，BakaXL will try force start game, Until confirm the folder exists
Disable it may cause BakaXL start game abnormal or crash. This setting will not sync to other folder's BakaXL

Set Java 9&higher version Java use GC Method. If your Java version lower 9,it doetn't work.
Only higher than Java 11 version can use "ZGC" Using "ZGC" in the wrong Java version will game crash
If you don't what's this，please choose "Default"。
Set Minecraft Window Size Bakaxl has listed some common resolution for you Choose "Custom" option to custom resolution
If you choose Minecraft core's lack Assets we will remind you.
If you think something was wrong but you forget that,you can try to reset set.
Select BakaXL background picture Your background not be upload to any where But we not suggest you select a R18 picture
The background effect can add blur effect to your background. Make a comfortable experience. Live Background and No Background Mode can't use this function. The Acrylic mode need Windows 10.
在BakaXL底部绑定额外的叠层以显示高级动态背景。 通过BakaXL x Wallpaper Engine联动显示动态背景。 该功能在部分分辨率和DPI缩放环境下无法正常工作。 若未您当前未在使用Wallpaper Engine，则BakaXL将会使用 你的桌面壁纸。
让背景图片跟随鼠标移动，营造视差效果。 打开此功能时，BakaXL将会稍许放大当前背景图片。 使用实况背景或者默认背景时，无法使用此功能。
设置BakaXL窗体和控件所使用的配色方案。
"Accessibility" 可让您让您根据个人需求自定义BakaXL的功能， 以满足不同的使用条件。
"主屏幕显示模式" 将决定BakaXL的主页面是否展示所有的磁贴和功能。 · 标准: 主屏幕默认不显示开始菜单和功能磁贴 · 传统: 主屏幕将始终显示开始菜单和功能磁贴 使用标准模式时，需要按下空格或鼠标点击主屏幕空白位置向上 拖拽进入开始菜单。
"切换核心磁贴" 将决定BakaXL的开始菜单中是否显示切换核心磁贴 您始终可以通过启动条的快捷交互来切换核心。 参见 "快捷切换核心"。
"快捷切换核心" 可提供在启动条上快捷切换Minecraft核心的操作 · 标准: 在启动条上不显示额外的切换核心按钮 · 传统: 在启动条上单独显示切换核心的按钮 使用标准模式时，需要通过拖拽"启动游戏"按钮切换核心。
失去焦点时自动停止背景音乐
您当前设置的BakaXL主题会提供用于播放的BakaXL主题背景音乐。 当此选项为关闭时，BakaXL将会关闭所有界面下背景音乐。
若您当前使用的主题包含音效包，则BakaXL会使用这些音效。 当此选项为关闭时，BakaXL将会关闭所有界面下的音效。
降低使用耳机时的音量

当此选项为开启时，BakaXL将会降低所有音频控件的输出音量。 若BakaXL的音量即使在调整至最大时依旧很小声，可关闭此选项。
在使用耳机时，请避免使用大音量聆听，过大的音量会导致听力变差。 在您使用耳机时请将音量调整至可透过耳机听见周围声音的大小。
自动侦测音频播放软件
BakaXL在启动时会侦测当前计算机中是否有正在运行的音频输出软件。 （如音乐播放器、语音聊天软件等） 在有音频播放时，BakaXL将会视情况自动关闭或降低背景音乐的音量。 若要恢复原先设置的音量大小，只需按住Ctrl并滚动鼠标滚轮。
使用来自bangbang93的BMCLAPI来为BakaXL的资源下载加速。 若要了解更多有关BMCLAPI的详情，请参阅： https://bmclapidoc.bangbang93.com/

长时间等待BakaXL对Minecraft资源进行补全时， 按照网络和计算机配置修改此选项。 试图在下载失败时重新下载则会消耗更多时间，可尝 试调整BakaXL重新下载的次数。
使用"发射模式"时，会停止更新下载的状态（例如百分比）。
并不是在所有情况下都能达到理论速度。(说不定会更慢) 请根据网络与计算机配置酌情选择。
BakaXL的部分文件使用了来自 Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛 所提供文件下载服务。 请参阅：https://www.mcbbs.net/
在使用计费互联网连接时开启， 开启后，笨蛋广场将在播放前询问您并降低视频播放的清晰度。 并不是所有在笨蛋广场提供的视频都支持降低清晰度播放。
BakaXL协议可以让您通过网站提供的按钮快速启动BakaXL。 根据网站按钮提供的参数，可使BakaXL直接启动特定内建功能。 参阅BakaXL开发人员中心了解如何将您的网站接入BakaXL协议。

BakaXL comes to a new version! This thanks to all the members joined BakaXL Insider Preview Program. Without their help, we can't build such an excellent BakaXL.
Right now,you can also join Insider make us better.
Join BakaXL Insider Preview Plan！experience & feedbakc!
BakaXL Insider Preview Version's features maybe removed or modified without prompting
预览版本的BakaXL因缺少必备功能，请勿加入整合包内进行分享。

我们为BakaXL引入了全新的更新通道机制，这意味着您可以更加频繁 的获得更新！
目前，我们为 BakaXL 预览体验计划 提供两种通道： Pigeon 鸽子通道（主要评估版本，提供近期最稳定功能更新） Parrot 鹦鹉通道（每日即时更新，提供BakaXL代码仓库最新的更新）
请注意：Parrot 鹦鹉通道 包含大量早期未开发完善和清理的功能且会随 时作出修改，请勿依赖于此版本。

您的计算机需要安装.Net Framework 4.5才可以运行BakaXL 3.0。 使用BakaXL 3.0的预览体验版本需要您使用Windows 7或更高级操作系统。 推荐您使用Windows 10操作系统以体验BakaXL 3.0的全部功能。
BakaXL 3.0已不再支持Windows XP操作系统。
All the members of BakaXL Developerment Team thank you for using BakaXL sincerely!
Only pushes the most stable test version
You can press the HOME button to continue the current content.
Force end the current content may cause the progress rate lost, and this process is irreversible.
Select a icon for this core.
正在检查用户是否可以运行Minecraft……
请等待我们连接到第三方验证服务器……
已经自动补全通信协议
BakaXL检测到您未设置验证服务器通信协议。 将自动使用HTTPS安全协议连接至此验证服务器。
请谨慎连接至此验证服务器
此验证服务器并未使用HTTPS安全协议。 继续使用此验证服务器将导致您的密码被明文传输。
使用了安全协议的服务器地址始终会以 https:// 开头
无法连接至此验证服务器
BakaXL无法连接至此验证服务器。 请检查此服务地址是否正确，并再试一次。
也请留意此验证服务器提供商的相关通知
无法解析该验证服务器的用户档案
该验证服务器返回了不符合规范的内容。 BakaXL无法解析此内容。
请联系该验证服务器开发者以了解更多信息
该账户没有任何可用的角色
验证服务器返回当前账户下并无可用的角色。 请先在该账户下创建一个角色，然后再试一次。
请前往此验证服务器的账户平台了解更多信息
BakaXL将要开始安装您所选定的游戏核心。 请稍等片刻，并在此期间不要断开互联网连接或关闭BakaXL。
在继续使用BakaXL笨蛋广场的服务前，您需要进行本体更新。 BakaXL需要更新至版本 {0}。
若BakaXL没有提示自动更新，则您需要在官网手动下载最新版本
BakaXL检测到上一次成功启动Minecraft后，游戏只运行了 {0} 秒。
这可能是由于Libraries文件缺失造成的
出现了异常情况，导致我们无法连接至BakaXL笨蛋广场服务器。 请稍后再试。若问题持续存在，请参阅BakaXL官网。
我们可能会在未经通知的情况下对服务器进行维护

快速设置可以帮助您根据系统当前的状态自动设置Minecraft运行所需的Java虚拟机及内存。
除此之外，快速设置还将会： · 开启 BakaXL的背景音乐和音效 · 允许 笨蛋广场请求您的位置信息 · 向BakaXL发送崩溃和启动诊断信息 · 开启 BMCLAPI 以加快在中国大陆地区的资源下载速度 · 自动加载所有已安装的BakaXL插件（并非所有的第三方插件都是安全的）
若您不了解Java虚拟机及游戏所需的内存大小，请使用快速设置
看上去您目前并未在计算机中安装Java。 Java虚拟机是运行Minecraft的必备组件，请务必安装。
若BakaXL未搜索到您的Java，您也可以手动定位其路径

你目前的系统内存不足512MB，强制启动MC可能造成一些异常现象（例如可能启动失败），建议你关闭无关紧要的软件（例如QQ、音乐播放器，迅雷等）

您确定要挑战极限吗？这将使BakaXL在下载Minecraft及其资源时调动计算机所有可以使用的资源进行下载。
启用发射模式会自动修改BakaXL的部分设置，并停用下载状态显示。

若您无法想起您的Mojang账户密码，不要着急，请访问Mojang账户的官网。
在密码重设(Reset Password)页面填入您Mojang账户的电子邮件地址，并点击 "请求密码重置"(Request password reset) 按钮。
在那之后，Mojang将会向您发送电子邮件帮助您重置账户的密码。
请确保域名为 account.mojang.com 且连接已通过SSL加密
无法连接至BakaXL Network服务器。 请检查您的互联网连接，或者留意BakaXL官方的维护公告。
BakaXL Network服务器拒绝了您的连接。 由于服务器要求使用最新版本的BakaXL，连接被终止。
无法登录至此BakaXL账户。 此账户不存在或密码错误，请检查您输入的内容然后再试一次。
无法登录至此BakaXL账户。 您的BakaXL账户没有参与早期体验测试。请耐心等待此服务正式上线。

此贴士频道当前暂停对外开放，这可能是由于： · 受到来自发行方要求暂停访问的请求。 · 遭到过多用户举报而自动冻结。 · 违反BakaXL贴士系统使用条款
请尝试过段时间再来访问此频道
一个未经处理的BakaXL异常(窗体线程)
一个未经处理的BakaXL异常(非窗体线程)
请立即将此错误上报BakaXL开发团队以便尽快修复。

BakaXL无法通过BMCLAPI或官方下载源获取最新的Minecraft核心列表。
在某些情况下，该问题有可能是因为您的互联网服务提供商(ISP)劫持了您的流量。
请检查您的互联网连接，确保计算机与下载源之间的网络通信是正常的。

若此问题持续出现，您可以向BakaXL开发团队汇报此问题。
远程服务器返回了一个错误的数据。

由于Minecraft官方下载源或BMCLAPI返回了一个当前BakaXL无法识别的版本信息，因此无法完成核心列表的准备。
在某些情况下，该问题有可能是因为您的互联网服务提供商(ISP)劫持了返回的数据。
请检查您的互联网连接，确保计算机与下载源之间的网络通信是正常的。

若此问题持续出现，您可以向BakaXL开发团队汇报此问题。
ULauncherCore汇报在准备游戏版本时出现异常

通常，出现此问题是因为ULauncherCore无法正确准备特定的Minecraft版本。
请检查您的互联网连接，确保计算机与下载源之间的网络通信是正常的。

您可以前往 BakaXL本体设置 - 下载 并切换 大陆地区使用第三方下载源 开关的状态后再试一次。
若此问题持续出现，您可以向BakaXL开发团队汇报此问题。
无法定位此版本Forge所需要的前置Minecraft本体核心：.minecraft/versions/{0}/{1}.jar。\r\n\r\n您可以尝试先安装此Minecraft版本的原版核心后，再试一次。
BakaXL Forge安装器报告在安装时出现异常。

尝试安装的Forge版本： Forge-{0}-{1}

造成此问题的原因可能是无法下载文件，或是解压时出现意外。
首先，请检查您的互联网连接，确保计算机与下载源之间的网络通信是正常的。
其次，尝试以管理员身份运行BakaXL，并再试一次安装。

若此问题持续出现，您可以向BakaXL开发团队汇报此问题。

尝试安装的Forge版本： Forge-{0}-{1}

通常，这可能由于下载的文件受损、访问本地文件权限不足，亦或是此版本的Forge不受支持造成的。
首先，尝试以管理员身份运行BakaXL，再试一次安装。
其次，检查此笨蛋罐头中的异常信息，若其中明确说明了该版本的Forge不受支持，请将此笨蛋罐头汇报至BakaXL开发团队。

若此问题持续出现，您可以向BakaXL开发团队汇报此问题。
无法解析Forge的安装档案(install_profile)，Json解释器返回了空的文本。
无法找到此版本Forge安装器包含的Forge核心(universal.jar)。\r\n\r\n无法兼容的Forge版本，请向BakaXL开发团队反馈此Forge版本：Forge-{0}-{1}
